subject: Err, no Betelgeuse supernova... maybe
author: Fiona Broome
full_text:
Hi,

Well, the Betelgeuse supernova would have fit the June 17th date.  Alas, as of late last night, it appears that the story was based on a rumor.  

http://blogs.discovermagazine.com/badastronomy/2010/06/01/is-betelgeuse-about-to-blow/

I'm still hoping for a reverse decision.

Disappointed,
Fiona
